![Superficial intrinsic back muscles posterior view @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020](/Alchemy Archive/Anatomy/OIANs/images/superficial intrinsic back mm fig3.10a gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020.png){#fig-superficialbackmm310agilroyAtlasAnatomy2020}

| Muscle  | Origin  | Insertion | Nerve | Action |
|--------|----------|-----------|-------|--------|
| Serratus Posterior Inferior | C1 (lateral mass) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 | Occipital bone (basilar part) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 | C1 Ant ramus @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 | Bilaterally flexes AOJ; Unilaterally I/L SB |

: Serratus Posterior Inferior OIAN {.striped .hover}

## Origin
T11-L2 (SP) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Insertion
8-12th ribs (inferior borders near angles) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Innervation
Spinal nn. T9-T12 (Anterior rami) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Action

Depresses ribs

# Muscle groups
Rectus capitis anterior is part of the [prevertebral muscle group]({{< var ref-oians >}})
